name: Monster Arena (Gonçalo Pinto)
description:
A simple local 1v1 2D arena brawler party game. Made as a personal project, is currently in a pre-alpha stage (i don't fucking know).

I made this prototype because I wanted to experiment with some visual assets I bought in HumbleBundle. I wanted to make a fun little game to play with friends on game nights. Now with all this virus situation I guess local multiplayer isn't the best solution, so if I get enough motivation I might just try to do a lan mode.

The next step is mostly visual and audio polish and bug scouting and fixing.

KNOWN WEBGL BUILD BUGS:

  • The canvas on the arena is not centered when the game isn't in fullscreen;
  • When the arena level is loaded sometimes you have to pause and unpause the game for the characters to move.

Made with Unity3D and C#.
